page.title: 02WESTERN PARK
page.content: Western Park is near the Wycliffe Community College.It is medium size public park with various recreational features for both adults and children. There is a childrens playground with swings,roundabouts,climbing frames and a paddling pool.A BMX track has recently been built and at weekends there are races for all ages. For the adults there are football pitches,cricket pitches and tennis courts. In the winter when it snows the park has some steep slopes that make wonderful sledge runs for families. In the park is a special school called the Western Park School this caters forchildren with special needs.
